tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CustomerComplaints (
  complaint_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(50),
  complaint_text TEXT,
  status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'Pending',
  resolved_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE complaints (
    complaint_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID NOT NULL,
    complaint_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'Open',
    timestamp TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE resolutions (
    resolution_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    complaint_id UUID NOT NULL,
    resolver_id UUID NOT NULL,
    resolution_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    resolution_timestamp TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE complaints_history (
	complaint_id INT,
	resolved_by_id INT,
	resolved_date DATE,
	resolution_details TEXT,
	FOREIGN KEY (complaint_id) REFERENCES customer_complaints(complaint_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ComplaintResolution (
    resolution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    complaint_id INT,
    resolution_text TEXT,
    resolved_by VARCHAR(50),
    resolution_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (complaint_id) REFERENCES CustomerComplaints(complaint_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ComplaintMapping (
    mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    complaint_id INT,
    category_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (complaint_id) REFERENCES CustomerComplaints(complaint_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES ComplaintCategories(category_id)
);
